body.description: Finish Ultimate Plus Infinity Shine for intensive clean and diamond shine first time, every time. It’s our first ever dishwasher tablet with CycleSync™ technology, which releases the right ingredient* to act at the right time. With added Protector Shield technology, Finish Dishwasher tabs provide material care protection for your glasses and tableware.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Woohoo! Finally found the best pods! I thought something was wrong with my dishwasher until I purchased these! Seems like these have an added layer of effectiveness, because all my dishes are sparkling. This also comes with an effective container for storage and none of the pods were stuck together or damaged.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Like all Finish dishwasher detergents, this product works great. I've been using their Powerball (solid piece, no liquid) for years and I didn't notice much difference using these Ultimate Plus tabs. Seeing that they're around the same price and Finish claims the Ultimate Plus is their best product I'll likely continue using this going forward.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These work better than the other options from Finish. Even better than other leading brands when it comes to getting dishes clean and not leaving spots. The dishes with these pods come out clean, shiny and no spots. I didn't need to add extra rinse agents. I have hard water so always adding Lemon Shine and still spots. Thought I would try these since they were advertised for use with older dishwashers and thought maybe it would work better with my portable dishwasher. Not that it was old just felt maybe the pressure of water was lower than a cabinet dishwasher. AMAZING! 1 hour wash cycle and dishes, glassware and silverware came out shiny and clean. Love this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean/ Dry Dishes Not Stinky
reviews.reviewText: To be fair, we got a new dishwasher that recommends Finish so we switched a few months ago. Our dishes have never been cleaner or dryer. There are no streaks and food is washed away. I’m guessing it’s a combo of the finish and new washer. The best part for me is the reduced scent. The other brand we used had a strong scent that I never understood. My dished should smell like nothing when they’re clean and that’s what I get with finish. If you like lemon scented dishes this isn’t for you… if you like unscented dishes, this may be a game changer like it was for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have 100% switched
reviews.reviewText: I used to be a die hard cascade gal, you couldn’t change my mind for a minute. Moved and the new house dishwasher seemed like it wasn’t drying dishes right, put in a service call and while waiting on a return called we tried these and low and behold we didn’t need to have it serviced, these help the dishes dry and do a great job cleaning and not leaving a weird residue on the dishes. I have switched and won’t be looking back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the easy to use pods and I've never used this brand before. I only use the machine once a week. After two months, I've only had the coating not dissolve once. Otherwise, my glasses don't have any hard water marks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works very well
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical of buying the more expensive dishwashing tablets, but these two seem to work the best of anything we have used over the past several years. They certainly clean better than any of the liquids we've used, and better than any of the other brands of tablets. We have two teenagers who eat a lot and we are constantly running our dishwasher, and these have never let us down.Everything comes out clean, with no scale or residue ever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get what you pay for…
reviews.reviewText: When this stuff is on sale, I buy it. Not necessarily because it cleans any better than the OG power all tabs, but because the gel packs are so much easier to work with over the Finish powdered tabs that come in the foil wrap. Nope, these little packs are grab, load and go… no unwrapping, no crumbling bits falling out, and of course, the dishes come out clean. Cleaner than the cheaper pressed powder tabs?? Not that I can see, but the convenience of it alone makes it a preferred choice.
